Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel in Berlin Adlershof”
Reviews.Author: thomas68_nl
Reviews.Content: The Dorint Adlershof is a nice and friendly business hotel for an ok price. If you have business in Adlershof or you need to be close to Schönefeld airport, the location is excellent. If you come to Beriln for almost anything else, it is not.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly business hotel”
Reviews.Author: mrsmith0179
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a single night due to a business trip and was pleased with my stay. Check in was friendly and smooth, room simple but well cleaned. Although the room was overlooking a rather large road it was all quiet and good to sleep. We had dinner at the restaurant which was basic but of good quality with a bit of unexperienced, but very polite and friendly service. I felt that the hotel staff was extremely young, friendly and helpful - thanks again for sending my BB cable to Frankfurt. The hotel location is of no specific tourist interest, but I can recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “inexpensive when pre booked and surprinsingly quiet”
Reviews.Author: raiPh3ah
Reviews.Content: Using the online early booking 1 month in advance I got a very reasonable rate. The hotel is located on a busy road with tram and bus traffic. My third floor room was on the backside of the building away from the road and there was no noticeable noise from the traffic. The room was clean and the staff friendly. Except for one afternoon coffee break (which was ok) I did not eat at the hotel restaurant. The location is near various buildings of the Humboldt university which was the reason for me choosing the hotel but one should be aware that it is rather far from the city center and the usual tourist attractions. Using public transport to go near Alexanderplatz will take about 30 minutes. Taxis are waiting across the street. There are bus and tram stops directly outside the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A good surprise”
Reviews.Author: Paul_Hamelin
Reviews.Content: Due to a mistake in our booking for another hotel made by the travel agent, we (a group of 10 friends) have been relocated in Dorint Hotel Adlershof. As tourists for a 4 days stay, the remote location of the hotel, 40 to 60 minutes to City center, depending on the time of the day or night, wasn't really the best, and we didn't fly from Schönefeld airport but from Tegel, exactly on the opposite side. Bad luck. But I have to say honestly that this hotel has been a good surprise which counterbalanced our bad luck. The hotel is quite new, modern, very clean; rooms and bathrooms are of a reasonable size and comfortable; there is an excellent buffet breakfast and staff was very friendly and helpful. Minor minus point: Wi-Fi is available in the rooms but not for free (there's only one free access on a PC in the lobby).

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected”
Reviews.Author: toddles1984
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel as part of a 'hotel + concert' package and didn't expect much, but we were really pleasantly surprised. The room and bathroom were a good size and very comfortable. All the staff were friendly and helpful and there was underground parking available. The breakfast buffet was included and was good quality. The hotel was quite far out of town but that was fine for us as we were going to a concert that evening. I would recommend this hotel to anybody needing to stay in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Good one”
Reviews.Author: Hellboy_20_10_10
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located far away from the city. However if you are planning to stay in a quiet location and nearby shoenefld airport this is the hotel for you. Very affordable price and good breakfast and service. it seems to me it is a very clean hotel with pleasant atmosphere. Highly recommended hotel for all classes, business or leisure. Full points.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent business hotel”
Reviews.Author: DonTobi
Reviews.Content: Great business hotel in Berlin Adlershof. The rooms are a decent size, very clean, practical, modern, and have incredibly comfortable beds. The breakfast buffet is also great. It's located in Adlershof. If you're a tourist visiting Berlin, this is an out-of-the-way place and doesn't need to be considered. If you need to visit Adlershof, this hotel is a great choice. Its close proximity to the S-Bahn is also a nice touch for those who want to explore Berlin in the evenings.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect business hotel, if you need to be in the area”
Reviews.Author: AlfredoLP
Reviews.Content: If you need a hotel in the area, it's a very good place with excellent value for money. Modern, clear rooms, good service, very good breakfast, reasonable price for its quality.

HotelInfo.Name: Dorint Adlershof Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Rudower Chaussee 15, 12489 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Ibis)
